-e ---

𒀿 ≈ 𒁹𒅕

ASHGAB / AŠGAB [631x] = leather-worker

ASH2 (út), aš2 = curse [51x]

𒀿 AŠGAB •šabag الصباغ al-ṣabbāgh "leatherworker" ⇔

𒀿 AŠGAB •ša'gabᵉʳ ≈ ցերեկավոր tserkavor

𒀿 erib Erbe "father-in-law; sister-in-law" 𒉫 eriBura

𒀿 šikangu #aškāpu leatherworker ⇔ 𒋢𒅆𒄣 kuš ši-kum šikum leather object #šipku?
